description: Pushing yourself up into the air using your legs.
Moving your legs very fast, quicker than walking.
example_usage: I can run to the tree.

description: Making music with your voice, like birds do.
Putting food in your mouth to chew and swallow.
example_usage: I want to eat an apple.
What do you like to eat?

description: Having fun and doing joyful activities.
example_usage: Do you want to play with me?

description: Taking liquid into your mouth and swallowing it.
Resting your body and mind with your eyes closed.
Looking at words to understand stories or facts.
example_usage: My mom reads me a story every night.

description: Making letters or words on paper with a pen.
example_usage: Please write a letter to your grandma.

description: Making pictures with a pen, pencil, or crayon.
Hitting your hands together to show you like something.
Moving your body to music in a fun way.
example_usage: I like to dance to the music.

description: Moving through the air with wings, like a bird.
example_usage: I wish I could fly like a superhero.

description: Sharing something with someone else freely.
example_usage: I will give you a present.

description: Squeezing someone tightly to show love.
example_usage: I will give you a hug.
My mom gives the best hugs.

description: Making happy sounds when something is funny.
example_usage: I love to hear you laugh.

description: Moving something to create a space or view.
Resting your body on your bottom, not standing.
example_usage: The dog knows how to sit.

description: Being upright on your feet, not sitting.
example_usage: Don't just stand there, do something.

description: Moving your body through water, like a fish.
example_usage: I like to swim in the pool.

description: Moving at a normal speed, one foot after another.
example_usage: I like to walk in the park.

description: Speaking words to communicate with others.
example_usage: We can talk about it later.
She loves to talk on the phone.

description: Looking with your eyes to notice things around you.
example_usage: Do you see what I see?

description: Listening with your ears to sounds.
Making contact with something using your hand.
Experiencing something with your senses or heart.
Directing your eyes to see something specific.
example_usage: He looked at me and smiled.

description: Paying attention to sounds with your ears.
Making it easier for someone to do something.
example_usage: I like to help my friends.

description: Saying something to get an answer or information.
example_usage: Don't be afraid to ask for help.
